Drafts 5 Documentation

This site is home to documentation for the upcoming release of Drafts 5, the next generation of Drafts, the popular quick-capture notes app.

This documentation covers pre-release features and may be incomplete or subject to change.

If you are a Drafts 4 user, we have a summary overview of whatâ€™s new in this release.
